title: Replication data for: Why Has US Policy Uncertainty Risen since 1960?
creator: Scott R. Baker
description: We consider two classes of explanations for the rise in policy-related economic uncertainty in the United States since 1960. The first stresses growth in government spending, taxes, and regulation. A second stresses increased political polarization and its implications for the policymaking process and policy choices.
